highlight_projects.title: My Portfolio
highlight_projects.description: A comprehensive showcase of my work, skills, and projects, designed to highlight my capabilities and contributions in web development.

highlight_projects.title: Bounce and Collect Game
highlight_projects.description: A fun game where you collect points while mastering gravity and elasticity.

highlight_projects.title: Music Player Project
highlight_projects.description: A web-based music player that allows you to play and manage your music library.

highlight_projects.title: The Movie DB
highlight_projects.description: A web application to browse and search movies using a movie database API.

highlight_projects.title: Window Props Plus
highlight_projects.description: A Chrome extension to add custom properties to the global window object.

all_projects.title: Rail API App React
all_projects.description: This project uses React, Styled Components, React Router, Redux, API handling, Hooks , Persist state in SessionStorage, Deploy to GitHub Pages etc... to show results for the particular search made by the user.

all_projects.title: Case Utils
all_projects.description: A utility library designed to provide various case manipulation functions, such as converting strings to different cases (camelCase, snake_case, etc.), making it easier for developers to handle string formatting in their applications.

all_projects.title: Block Game
all_projects.description: A simple web-based game that challenges players to navigate a block through various obstacles. The game focuses on improving hand-eye coordination and reaction time.

all_projects.title: Lawyer Project
all_projects.description: A web application aimed at providing legal services and resources. It may include features like document management, client communication, and case tracking, tailored for legal professionals.

all_projects.title: LookLike Cosmetic Store
all_projects.description: An e-commerce platform that showcases cosmetic products. Users can browse, search, and purchase items, with features like product reviews and ratings to enhance the shopping experience.

all_projects.title: Booker - Textbook Renter
all_projects.description: A platform that allows students to rent textbooks at affordable prices. It connects students with available textbooks, facilitating easy access to educational resources without the high costs of purchasing.

all_projects.title: Wedding Site
all_projects.description: A personal wedding website template that couples can customize to share their wedding details, including event schedules, guest lists, and gift registries, making it easier for guests to stay informed.

all_projects.title: Portfolio V1
all_projects.description: An earlier version (v1) of my portfolio website. The site showcases my work, skills, and projects in a visually appealing and responsive format.

all_projects.title: Portfolio V0
all_projects.description: The initial version (v0) of my portfolio website. The site showcases my work, skills, and projects in a visually appealing and responsive format.

all_projects.title: Panda Image
all_projects.description: A simple image gallery or viewer application that allows users to upload, view, and manage images. It may include features like image editing and sharing options.

all_projects.title: Calculator
all_projects.description: A web-based calculator application that performs basic arithmetic operations. It provides a user-friendly interface for quick calculations, suitable for everyday use.

all_projects.title: Todo React App
all_projects.description: A task management application built with React that allows users to create, edit, and delete tasks. It helps users organize their daily activities and improve productivity.

all_projects.title: Memory Game
all_projects.description: A classic memory card game where players flip cards to find matching pairs. It enhances memory skills and provides an engaging way to pass the time.

all_projects.title: Modal Image
all_projects.description: A web component that displays images in a modal format, allowing users to view images in a larger size without navigating away from the current page. It enhances user experience by providing a seamless viewing option.
